price: (5) Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kāfūr,[1812]
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
